examples: I was wearing a newly acquired jacket
The firm is planning on expanding the newly acquired company.
Coding is a newly acquired skill for me.
The museum will unevil its newly acquired mammoth skeleton in the new year.

body_content.explanation: having recently signed an agreement to play for a team:
examples: The club had put all their hopes on their newly acquired striker.
Seattle's newly acquired forward has been placed on injured reserve.
The 24-year-old point guard, newly acquired by Dallas, put up some stunning numbers in his last collegiate season.
